name: The End of the Aisle
writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Carter Bays, Craig Thomas
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Cristin Milioti
plot: With only half an hour to go, both Barney and Robin have panic attacks about their upcoming nuptials. Meanwhile, Marshall and Lily rewrite their old wedding vows.
